text: John L. Henderson (born 1932) is an American university administrator. He was President of Wilberforce University from 1988 to 2002,Rep. David Lee Hobson, Recognizing Wilberforce University President Dr. John L. Henderson, 14 June 2002 and the first black president of the Council of Independent Colleges. His papers are held at the Johnnie Mae Berry Library, Cincinnati State Technical and Community College.Dr. John L. Henderson collection, approximately 1975-2011 ==References== ==External links== * Dr. John Henderson Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Wilberforce University Category:Heads of universities and colleges in the United States
title: John L. Henderson
